text: Elisabeth Claira Heath Sladen (1 February 1946 – 19 April 2011) was an English actress. She was best known for portraying the role of Sarah Jane Smith in the BBC sci-fi series Doctor Who (1973–1976, 1983, 2006, 2008, 2010). From 2007 to 2011, Sladen portrayed Sarah Jane in the CBBC spin-off series The Sarah Jane Adventures. She died in Southall, west London on 19 April 2011 from cancer. ==Early life== Born on 1 February 1946 in Liverpool, Sladen attended the Elliott-Clarke Drama school. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Elisabeth Sladen
